ResourceTemplate.Name: TeraVM Management Assistant
ResourceTemplate.Description: TeraVM Management Assistant deploys controllers and test modules to vCenter.

Attribute.Name: TVM Comms Default Network
Attribute.Value: Dedicated vCenter Virtual Network For TeraVM vms

Attribute.Name: Management Network
Attribute.Value: Dedicated vCenter Virtual Network For TeraVM Management

Attribute.Name: VM Location
Attribute.Value: vCenter FOLDER PATH FOR DEPLOYED TERAVM VMS

Attribute.Name: Holding Network
Attribute.Value: HOLDING NETWORK FOR TEST MODULE NETWORK ADAPTERS
